description:
English is the most widely spoken language in the UK. However, because leftist officials have decided that no human is illegal, requesting someone to speak English can be classified as a “hate crime.”

British police asked a man if he requested another man to speak English. However, it turns out the “suspect” was actually deaf, and his only offense was asking the other person to speak more clearly.

‘Did you ask him to speak English?

….Because if you did, that could be perceived as a hate crime’

(No says the deaf man, I asked him to speak clearly as I couldn’t understand him).

Give me strength.

What is actually happening to this country?

🤡🌎pic.twitter.com/C7bjmzgfdE
— Michelle Dewbe
title: It's now a hate crime to ask people to "speak English" in the UK (our alleged ally)

description:
While the left would love it if you believed the people did not vote for the status quo or support it, that could not be further from the truth.

CNN's Harry Enten just said the quiet part out loud, which is that only two percent of voters regret voting for Trump.

🚨NEW: CNN's Harry Enten DUMPS cold water on narrative that Trump voters "regret" backing him🚨

"I hear all these stories, all these articles, 'All the Trump voters, they regret what they did back in 2024.' I'm here to tell you, 'Uh uh.' Very few of them regret what they did… pic.twitter.com/0IPvrpk0VS
— Jason Cohen 🇺🇸 (@JasonJournoDC) April 16, 2025
title: As CNN tries convincing you people regret voting for Donald Trump, their polling guru has news that will break their hearts

description:
As the unofficial home for all things Chris Pratt (that fit in with what we do here), you would think we'd run out of ways to be impressed by him. I mean, the guy only eats what he kills, loves the military, loves his country, and loves his fans more than most everyone else in Hollywood combined. When Chris Pratt walks by... well... I just get very comfortable.

Then came how he celebrated Easter. These photos were posted to his Instagram account in 2
title: Chris Pratt prepares for Easter as only he can: by erecting a giant cross

description:
Scott Jennings is the lone voice of reason on CNN about a whole assortment of topics, ranging from illegal immigration to the economy to his valiant attempts to suggest Democrat Congresspeople stop being so cringe. But his hottest take? The demonic nature of grown ass adults who dress up as bunny rabbits.

Abby asked me for an unpopular opinion this morning (aren’t all of mine unpopular? lol) so I went with: human sized Easter bunnies. They are demonic and must be eliminated. pic.twitter.com/UwlaCXQT7Y
— Scott Jennings (@ScottJenningsKY) April 5, 2025
title: As CNN's Scott Jennings warns about adults dressed as rabbits, here's one pummeling some dude on these streets
